rport.desc: Port to attack on chosen IPs

users.desc: User (ie: 'admin'), range or file with them (ie: file:./artifacts/dics/john.txt) to test

passwords.desc: Passwords (or file with them) to test

userAsPass.desc: Test the same user as password for each one

delay.desc: Delay between batches of requests (depending of the 'concurrency'), in ms.

concurrency.desc: Number of requests to do at the same time. Only works if 'delay' is not 0

timeout.desc: Time to wait for a response, in ms.
